videos.description: Matt Coleman gets a steal and makes a great pass to Jericho Sims who jams it home.
videos.headline: Texas turns steal into Sims dunk

videos.description: Texas head coach Shaka Smart thinks rebounding is key for the Longhorns in the second half.
videos.headline: Smart is happy the team is playing for each other

videos.description: The University of Texas family share their love for Andrew Jones who was diagnosed with leukemia today.
videos.headline: Longhorns show support for Andrew Jones

videos.description: Vladimir Brodziansky goes up for a layup but his shot is rejected by Mohammed Bamba.
videos.headline: Bamba protects the rim with block

videos.description: Matt Coleman passes to Mohammed Bamba who throws down a powerful jam.
videos.headline: Bamba hammers home one-handed jam

videos.description: Alex Robinson's nice pass leads to JD Miller throwing down a big dunk for TCU.
videos.headline: Miller punishes the rim with two-handed jam

videos.description: Matt Coleman hits the jumper in traffic as the shot clock expires for Texas.
videos.headline: Coleman's jumper just beats shot clock

videos.description: Eric Davis Jr. hits a 3-pointer to beat the shot clock for Texas.
videos.headline: Davis bails out Texas with 3-pointer

videos.description: Alex Robinson dumps it off to Vladimir Brodziansky who scores the game tying basket late in second half for the Hornfrogs.
videos.headline: Brodziansky layup ties it late for TCU

videos.description: Horn Frogs make the extra pass leading to Kenrich Williams knocking down another shot from behind the arc.
videos.headline: Good passing by TCU leads to Williams' 3-pointer

videos.description: Eric Davis Jr. drives and kicks it to the corner where Dylan Osetkowski nails a 3-pointer.
videos.headline: Osetkowski drills clutch 3-pointer for Texas

videos.description: Vladimir Brodziansky hits the shot as the clock expires to push the game to a double overtime.
videos.headline: Brodziansky jumper at the buzzer forces 2OT

videos.description: Jaylen Fisher had a great look but could not score, as TCU falls to Texas on the road in double overtime, 99-98.
videos.headline: Fisher misses potential game-winning layup for TCU

videos.description: Texas head coach Shaka Smart  proud of how his team fought under tough circumstances of teammate Andrew Jones being diagnosed with leukemia today.
videos.headline: Smart happy his team got a win for Andrew Jones

videos.description: Tim Welsh and Clay Matvick break down how Texas was able to come up with a upset win over TCU despite an emotional day.
videos.headline: Texas did just enough to defeat TCU
